article.headline: Colgate 97, Hobart 67
article.story: HAMILTON, N.Y. (AP) -- Howard Blue scored 23 points to lead Colgate over Hobart 97-67 Saturday afternoon. Colgate (5-3) led 56-30 at halftime, and never trailed in the second half. The Statemen (2-4) pulled to within 30 points when Woody Kampmann hit a free throw in the waning seconds for the final score of 97-67. Andrew Zidar had 11 points and 10 rebounds for Colgate, while Alvin Reed had 11 points. Kyle Chones and Jon Simon added nine points apiece. Mike Manning led Hobart with 19 points, while Brad Strait had 13 and Tim Apuzzo 12.
